Package de.feu.massim22.group3.communication

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
de.feu.massim22.group3.communication.Scheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EisSender, DebugStepListener, eis.AgentListener, eis.EnvironmentListener
public class Scheduler extends Object implements eis.AgentListener, eis.EnvironmentListener, EisSender, DebugStepListener
A scheduler for agent creation and execution. EISMASSim scheduling needs to be enabled (via config), so that getAllPercepts() blocks until new percepts are available! (Also, queued and notifications should be disabled)
Author:
massim team, Heinz Stadler, Melinda Betz
